thread.title: Videocon Z51 Punch, Z51Q Star smartphones launched priced at Rs 5,999, Rs 5, 490
thread.title_full: Videocon Z51 Punch, Z51Q Star smartphones launched priced at Rs 5,999, Rs 5, 490 | The Financial Express

author: financialexpress.com
title: Videocon Z51 Punch, Z51Q Star smartphones launched priced at Rs 5,999, Rs 5, 490
text:
Videocon today launched the Z51 Punch and Z51Q Star smartphones priced at Rs 5,999 and Rs 5, 490 respectively, which promise to deliver the best camera and design features at an affordable cost.
Both Videocon Z51 Punch and Z51Q Star smartphones pack features like Quad-Core Processor, 3G network, Android Kit-Kat OS and extended battery life for fast multitasking and faster on-the-go connectivity.
Jerold Pereira, CEO, Videocon Mobile Phones says,” Videocon Mobile Phones endeavours to meet the emerging requirements of value-for-money smartphones, which combine robust performance with unmatched features.
Videocon Z51 Punch carries the latest Android 4.4.2 KitKat OS, and is backed by 1.2 GHz Quad-Core Processor and 1 GB RAM, which vows both speed and smooth functioning. Z51 Punch also features 8MP auto-focus rear camera to snap quality pictures, and clicks high-quality selfies; the smartphone also captures clear Video Calling via Skype with its 5 MP Front Camera.
Powered by 3000 mAh battery, Z51 Punch offers an extended on-the-go connectivity on 3G network while the entertainment part is displayed on 5-inch IPS Capacitive Touch Screen to watch video with clarity. The smartphone supports 8GB internal memory (expandable up to 32GB) and offers other utility features like Dual SIM, Bluetooth, GPS, Radio, G-sensor and proximity sensors. Not just a great power device, the Z51 Punch comes encased in styled casings in black and grey profiles. The complete smartphone package comes with an attached flipcover at a budget-friendly price of Rs. 5,999.
On the other hand, Videocon Z51Q Star provides a top Android experience at an affordable pricing, the Videocon Z51Q Star comes with a rich 5-inch FWVGA IPS Capacitive Touch Screen that ensures the good visibility from all angles. The device is packed with latest Android 4.4.2 KitKat OS, 1GB RAM and a 1.2 GHz Quad-Core Processor, offering faster multi-tasking, and a smooth smartphone experience at an price of Rs 5,490.
Available in black colour profile, Z51Q Star is equipped with a high-quality 5MP BSI auto focus rear camera and a 2MP front camera for seamless Video Calling via 3G network/Skype that also clicks brilliant selfies. Packed with features like 8GB internal memory (expandable up to 32GB), Dual SIM, Bluetooth, 3G connectivity, the handset is enabled by a ‘lightning-fast’ HSPA+ up to 21mbps download capability for faster internet browsing and access backed by a robust 2000 mAh battery. It has a host of sensors including a G-Sensor, P-Sensor along with GPS/A-GPS ensures accurate device operations.
 29, 2015 1:49 pm © The Indian Express Online Media Pvt Ltd
